Description:
Detects the creation of files with certain extensions on a static web site. This can be indicative of potential uploads of a web shell.

Author: Beyu Denis, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, Thurein Oo
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Webshell Creation On Static Website
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((filepath like '%\inetpub\wwwroot\%' and (filepath like '%.ashx%' or filepath like '%.asp%' or filepath like '%.ph%' or filepath like '%.soap%')) or ((filepath like '%\www\%' or filepath like '%\htdocs\%' or filepath like '%\html\%') and filepath like '%.ph%')) and  not ((filepath like '%\appdata\local\temp\%' or filepath like '%\windows\temp\%') or process_path = 'system' or filepath like '%\xampp%'))
